MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power fault in WA9 postcode area of St Helens, affecting properties in Dale Crescent and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware at 6:52PM. Our engineers are on site and are investigating the cause of the fault, our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. Due to a suspected underground cable fault we now expect your power to be restored by 1AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:02PM on the 27th December 2020.
